A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a life-long Star Wars fan.  I saw A New Hope with my dad when I was 5 years old.  I hold Star Wars parties every May the 4th.  Yes\, I'm a geek.  I bought tickets for the first show opening day.  Maybe my hopes were too high\, but I left thoroughly disappointed.  What has Rian Johnson done to my beloved characters?!?  Luke was unrecognizable in personality.  Leia--flying thru space like Superman?  I could go on and on.  This movie kicked off my seasonal depression.  Thanks!
